tool_description: Parses and structures raw review data into standardized format for analysis, extracting key fields and normalizing ratings.

raw_data_source.description: Source identifier for the raw review data to parse

normalize_ratings.description: Whether to normalize ratings to a 1-5 scale

extract_dates.description: Whether to extract and standardize review dates

language_filter.description: Language code to filter reviews (en, es, fr, etc.) or 'all' for no filtering

error_messages: Invalid data source: The specified raw_data_source could not be found or accessed.
Parsing failed: Raw data format is not recognized or corrupted.
Language detection error: Unable to detect or filter by the specified language code.
Missing required fields: Raw data lacks essential fields like review text or ratings.
usage: Provide the raw_data_source identifier from Review Data Collector output. Optionally configure normalization and filtering. Returns structured review data ready for analysis.

failed_parses.description: Number of reviews that failed to parse

average_review_length.description: Average character length of parsed review text

date_range_parsed.description: Array containing start and end dates of parsed reviews

parsing_summary.description: Summary of parsing results and data quality
